metadata.title: CVE-2019-0230 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Apache Struts 2.0.0 to 2.5.20 forced double OGNL evaluation, when evaluatedon raw user input in tag attributes, may lead to remote code execution.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
